question: 1.Which of the following is not an indirect test?
2. The principle behind rebound hammer test is_____.

answers.a: rebound of an elastic mass depends on the hardness of the surface it strikes
answers.b: rebound of an elastic mass depends on the roughness of the surface it strikes
answers.c: rebound of an inelastic mass depends on the adhesion of the surface it strikes
answers.d: rebound of an inelastic mass depends on the hardness of the surface it strikes
